metadata.synopsis: Karlach has the first upgrade and sees Dammon for the first time in the act after when she got it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: (Not implemented yet)In act 2: - Get first upgrade in act 1.- Go to haven.In act 3:- Get the first upgrade in act 1 or 2.- Not have the second upgrade.- Not seen him in act 2 if got the upgrade in act 1.- Go to his shop.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Hey, it's Dammon! Let's say hi.
